name: Collaborative Development
description:
The player has to go through multiple obstacles, from an enemy jet to a creature that'll follow you around and more! You're able to collect more lives to survive till the end of the game. You're able to move around using the WASD or arrow keys and shoot bullets using the space bar. You're also able to collect special bullets to power up your attacks!

Sound Effects: https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/search/laser/
